option.name: images
option._long: The files to use as background images, repetition will occur if you have fewer than hsize*vsize images. Note using fewer images will conserve video memory Format is as follows: for loading a file file:pathToFile:opacity where opacity is in the 0 to 1 range. For a solid fill you can use fill:r,g,b:opacity where r g b and opacity are in the 0 to 1 range.
